person.persName: Alanson Trigg (Barren County, KY plantation owner)

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, farmer. Bedford, County, Virginia, native. Son of Haiden Trigg Sr. and Martha Gatewood Trigg. Married Mary Frances Martin Trigg. Father of Eliza Trigg, Haiden Trigg, Alanson C. Grigg, William Trigg, and John Trigg. Resident of Barren County in 1840. Enslaved twenty-four people in Barren County in 1840. Farmer in Glasgow, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Barren County in 1860.
